attributes.action: Remove NHS prescription charges for adult sufferers of Cystic Fibrosis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before being elected to power in 1997,this government made a commitment to remove prescription charges for adult sufferers of the genetic condition Cystic Fibrosis (C F ).
CF is an incurable genetically transmitted condition which often results in death in childhood or early adulthood and is the only illness of it's type where sufferers have to pay for prescriptions for life saving day to day treatments.
To date this government has yet to uphold it's pledge of over 10 years ago.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove NHS prescription charges for adult sufferers of Cystic Fibrosis."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13271.asp

Prime Minister's Office
